remarks:
The Cartesian product of two sets is a set.  Proposition 6.2 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23.  See also ~ xpexgALT .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.) 

---

 The cross product of two sets is a set.  Proposition 6.2 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.)
statement: xpexg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( A X. B ) e. _V ) $.
